mapper.select: SELECT c.tm_no, c.tm_dt, c.hhmm, c.wy_cd, d.dt_cd_nm as wy_nm, c.st_cd, f.dt_cd_nm AS st_nm, c.rsv_num, c.al_rsv_num, c.wa_num, c.al_wa_num, c.price FROM ( SELECT a.tm_no, a.tm_dt, a.hhmm, a.wy_cd, CASE WHEN b.rsv_num = al_rsv_num::bigint THEN '03' ELSE a.st_cd END st_cd, COALESCE(b.rsv_num, 0) AS rsv_num, a.al_rsv_num, COALESCE(b.wa_num, 0) AS wa_num, a.al_wa_num, a.price FROM time_info a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tm_no, COUNT(case when rv_cd = '01' then 1 end) AS rsv_num, COUNT(case when rv_cd = '02' then 1 end) AS wa_num FROM reservation_info GROUP BY tm_no ) b ON a.tm_no = b.tm_no ) c JOIN ( SELECT mst_cd, dt_cd, dt_cd_nm FROM dt_cd WHERE mst_cd = 'WY01' ) AS d ON c.wy_cd = d.dt_cd JOIN ( SELECT mst_cd, dt_cd, dt_cd_nm FROM dt_cd WHERE mst_cd = 'ST01' ) AS f ON c.st_cd = f.dt_cd ORDER BY c.tm_dt, c.hhmm

insert into user_info (usr_no, usr_nm, usr_zip, usr_ad, usr_ad_dt, usr_pn, usr_ju) values ( nextval('seq_usr_no'), #{custNm}, #{postCode}, #{roadAddr}, #{dtlAddr}, #{custPhone}, #{custSSNF} || #{custSSNB} ) on conflict (usr_ju) do update set temp = (select setval('seq_usr_no', currval('seq_usr_no')-1) as TEST), usr_nm = #{custNm}, usr_zip = #{postCode}, usr_ad = #{roadAddr}, usr_ad_dt = #{dtlAddr}, usr_pn = #{custPhone} returning usr_no

insert into reservation_info ( rsv_no, usr_no, tm_no, us_cd, rv_cd, rsv_dt ) values
( nextval('seq_rsv_no'), #{item.usr_no}::numeric, #{item.tm_no}::numeric, #{item.us_cd}, #{item.rv_cd}, to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') )
( currval('seq_rsv_no'), #{item.usr_no}::numeric, #{item.tm_no}::numeric, #{item.us_cd}, #{item.rv_cd}, to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') )
returning rsv_dt
